attributes.action: Ban the sale of all tobacco products (cigarettes etc)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to improve everyones health and reduce the amount of wasted healthcare time and money, please ban the sale of all tobacco products. Many people want to give up anyway and don't have the willpower so this would help them whilst also preventing everyone else from being poisoned by their smoke passively

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
